original_title: Between Land and Sea: A Year in the Life of an Atlantic Surf Town
overview: Against the backdrop of Irelandâ€™s stunning west coast, this film digs deep into the day to day lives of the surf community, taking the audience beyond the bluster of the typical adrenaline fueled film to create a very real portrait of those who choose the surf lifestyle.
title: Between Land and Sea: A Year in the Life of an Atlantic Surf Town
